name: mc-models
description: json schemas for validations and generated ts models

scripts.prepare: npm run generate && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf src/types && rimraf src/TypeMap.ts rimraf *.tgz
scripts.dockerLocal: docker build -t mc-models --build-arg host=localhost . && docker run -d -p 80:80 --name mc-models mc-models
